name: GOG The Sceror (DEMO 2)
description:
GOG The sceror (DEMO2)

Joko is a man who is known to have a high level of paranormal knowledge, he gets a message from someone named Usep because Usep's child seems to be exposed to black magic.

Joko as a certified experienced master, and outstanding achievement in his knowledge, he is willing to accept the offer.

Although the risk that will be accepted by Joko is great, but because he is unemployed, does not have a job, he continues to carry out Usep's duties.

In the game, the voice of the language = Sundanese (one of the regional languages in Indonesia)

subtitles = english

let's play, don't forget to use headphones or big speakers,

especially if you play it in a public cemetery, or while camping alone at night in the unspoiled wilderness. it can make your gaming experience really, really awesome

.

DEMO 1, tells about the beginning of GOG The sceror, the player plays the main character named Joko.

DEMO 2, the story of Gina and agus.
